short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace x.com links with fxtwitter.com links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FXTwitter Link Replacer is a must-have browser extension for Twitter enthusiasts who enjoy sharing tweets on Discord. This extension simplifies and enriches your Twitter sharing experience by improving the way Twitter links appear on Discord. Just click the share button and then the "copy link" button, and the extension does the rest by modifying the URL of the copied link to fxtwitter.com, guaranteeing a much better display on Discord!
